PageTitle: peer listen-only connect-only (BGP-VPN instance IPv4 address family view)(IPv4)
FuncDef:
The peer listen-only command configures a peer group to only listen to connection requests and not to initiatively send connection requests.
The undo peer listen-only command cancels the function.
The peer connect-only command configures a peer group to send connection requests but rejects connection requests.
The undo peer connect-only command restores the default setting. The peer listen-only command configures a peer group to only listen to connection requests and not to initiatively send connection requests. The undo peer listen-only command cancels the function. The peer connect-only command configures a peer group to send connection requests but rejects connection requests. The undo peer connect-only command restores the default setting. By default, a peer listens to and accepts connection requests, and sends connection requests.
ParentView: BGP-VPN instance IPv4 address family view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IPv4 peer address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
To enable a peer to listen to connection requests but not to send connection requests, run the peer listen-only command.
To enable a peer to send connection requests but not to accept connection requests, run the peer connect-only command.
